name: Lil'lith
description:
Warning, this is a very very early version and does not represent the final result. We are still in an alpha stage, balancing, visuals, and mechanics can still change a lot. This version will give you an idea of the concept and will allow me to have your feedback to improve the game!

Current version, limited to 10 minutes and is not really fun, and it's normal for the moment.
